title: harbor-templater
summary: A dynamic project scaffolding CLI (Vite-style) driven by JSON templates.

init.description: Scaffold a project from a JSON template.

flags.--template (-t): Path or URL to a template JSON file (required).
flags.--defaults: Do not prompt; use defaults and provided answers.
flags.--dryRun: Print actions without writing files or running commands.
flags.--conflict: When targets exist: error|skip|overwrite|prompt (default: prompt; becomes error under --defaults).
flags.--allowMissingEnv: Do not fail if an env var is missing for an environment step.

notes: Remote sources are supported via http(s) URLs and github:owner/repo#ref:path.
Merge currently supports JSON (deep/shallow) and text (append/prepend).
YAML merge is planned but not implemented yet.
